reviews.text: This was by far the worse hotel i ever stayed in. It was a complete disaster. Don't know where to start, reception, horror, checked in some small FILTHY room. The room stank. The blanket was full of other peoples hair, stains, ... disgusting.
reviews.title: nightmare in Torino
Wrong side of the Tracks....literally
reviews.text: The area is very scary, lots of drunks around.
